turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'm I'm in the mood for some coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where would you like to get coffee from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, what was that street name again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: East 62nd Street & Broad Ripple in Indianapolis.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to get a a venti Caffè Americano with whipped cream.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And an extra shot of espresso, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering a venti caffe americano with whipped cream, an extra shot of espresso, and 2% milk to be picked up at the starbucks on 62nd street, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your drink will be ready in 5 minutes, and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'm No, I'm super excited. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
